entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 11:31 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
